channel.title: The Best Server Source?
channel.description:
Well after a long time away from runescape i desided to make a server (again) - for the fun of it. So i googled myself into moparscape.
After a while i saw that theres ALOT of Server Sources around.
Now , i have tryed like 10 sources but there ofcourse many buggs and diffrent bugs on all of em.
What can -you say is the best server source on the forums??
1 Requirement; - Must have Pk - Why? Cause thats the Funzor with a private server , playing RS on Lan partys would have been great :P
Until from those i have tryed i think: [b]"zipposcape version 1" - was the best.[/b]
[b]I have tryed these sources:[/b] - "zipposcape version 1" - "Ultima_pk" - "Tos-Scape v3 Update 90" - "TestScape Source" - "SvenScap3pk_v2" - "Source of pkers1337scape V1" - "PhoneScape V.2" - "PvpScape New Version Fixed" - "Project16 V.6" - "pimpscape" - "P16_Blitz" - "MoparScape Standard Source Server" - "Fr33sc4p3 pkz" - "Fearscape" - "Eyrescape Source" - "Demonscape_V[1].3" - "CydalPkz"

item.title: The Best Server Source?
item.dc:creator: @mresi5656 mresi5656
item.description:
@mresi5656 wrote:

im not sure where to ask but i have testscape and when i try to change "character status= 0 to mod or admin it just changes back…

Read full topic

item.title: The Best Server Source?
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

[quote=“Pker, post:4, topic:63105”][quote author=fr33sc4p3 link=topic=91219.msg957112#msg957112 date=1172874016]
The whole point of a source is to pick witch one you like the most, and then modifiy it, get rid of them bugs …
[/quote]

Im to lazy to do that, i just want to get a working private server and check how its working,
i dont know java very well, and i dont want to learn it right now either[/quote] if your lazy, dont play this game and stop wasting all of our time here then, you need to know how to at least edit stuff, which takes 10 secs, and downloading a source from download section, which takes 1 min. if your lazy, then… its quite sad. no one just “gets” a working server.

Read full topic

item.title: The Best Server Source?
item.dc:creator: @Pker Pker
item.description:
@Pker wrote:

Well after a long time away from runescape i desided to make a server (again) - for the fun of it. So i googled myself into moparscape.

After a while i saw that theres ALOT of Server Sources around.

Now , i have tryed like 10 sources but there ofcourse many buggs and diffrent bugs on all of em.

What can -you say is the best server source on the forums??

1 Requirement;

  • Must have Pk - Why? Cause thats the Funzor with a private server , playing RS on Lan partys would have been great

Until from those i have tryed i think:
“zipposcape version 1” - was the best.

I have tryed these sources:

  • “zipposcape version 1”
  • “Ultima_pk”
  • “Tos-Scape v3 Update 90”
  • “TestScape Source”
  • “SvenScap3pk_v2”
  • “Source of pkers1337scape V1”
  • “PhoneScape V.2”
  • “PvpScape New Version Fixed”
  • “Project16 V.6”
  • “pimpscape”
  • “P16_Blitz”
  • “MoparScape Standard Source Server”
  • “Fr33sc4p3 pkz”
  • “Fearscape”
  • “Eyrescape Source”
  • “Demonscape_V[1].3”
  • “CydalPkz”
